summary: Detective Reena Hale (Witt) is revisited by the stalker who traumatized her years ago by offing any man she fell in love with.
cast: Alicia Witt|Scott Bakula|Matthew Settle|Talia Shire|Eric Keenleyside|John Reardon|Benjamin Ayres|Chris Fassbender|Taylor Dauphinais|David Lawrence Brown|Liam Nelson|Rod Heatherington|Chad Nobert|Peter Skagen|Daniela Vlaskalic|Karen Johnson-Diamond|Patrick J. MacEachern|Rylan Wilkie|Margherita Donato|Nora Roberts
title: Jugando con fuego
